items.sentence: I think that Tom could've refused to do that.
I think that Tom could tell you who did that.
I think that Tom could easily have done that.
I think that Tom could be tempted to do that.
I think that Tom can do that without my help.
I think that Tom should tell Mary to do that.
I think that Tom won't be tempted to do that.
I think that Tom won't be nervous doing that.
I think that Tom will probably do that later.
I think that Tom will be hesitant to do that.
I knew that Tom might be required to do that.
I knew that Tom would likely have to do that.
I knew that Tom would likely need to do that.
I knew that Tom would likely want to do that.
I knew that Tom would show me how to do that.
I knew that Tom would tell me how to do that.
I knew that Tom wouldn't ask Mary to do that.
I knew that Tom wouldn't have fun doing that.
I know that Tom and Mary have both done that.
I thought that you said you hated doing that.
